```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(glue)
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Lora")
font_add_google("Fira Sans Condensed")

showtext_opts(dpi = 320)
showtext_auto()
```


```{r}
school_diversity <-
  readr::read_csv(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-09-24/school_diversity.csv"
  ) %>%
  set_names(tolower)
```


```{r}
df <- school_diversity %>% 
  select(leaid, st, school_year, asian)%>% 
  group_by(leaid) %>% 
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(n == 2) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = 'school_year', values_from = 'asian') %>% 
  mutate(prc_diff = `2016-2017` - `1994-1995`)
```


```{r}
asian_plot <- df %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_curve(aes(
    x = -10,
    y = `1994-1995`,
    xend = `2016-2017`,
    yend = -30,
    color = prc_diff
  ),
  curvature = -0.4,
  size = .1,
  ncp = 10) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 25),
                     labels = glue::glue("{seq(0, 100, 25)}%")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 25),
                     labels = glue::glue("{seq(0, 100, 25)}%")) +
  scale_color_gradient2(low = "deeppink",
                        mid = "bisque", 
                        high = "deeppink4",
                        breaks = seq(-100, 100, 50),
                        limits = c(-100, 100),
                        labels = glue::glue("{seq(-100, 100, 50)}%")) +
  guides(color = guide_colorbar(title = "% of Change",
                                title.position = "top",
                                title.hjust = .5,
                                barheight = unit(3, "mm"),
                                barwidth = unit(70, "mm")))+
  facet_wrap(~st, nrow = 5) +
  labs(x = "2016 - 2017",
       y = "1994 - 1995",
       title = "Change in Proportion of Asian Students in Schools over States from 1994-95 to 2016-2017",
       subtitle = "<span style = 'color: #3b0056'>AZ, CA, MT, NJ and NY</span> are the most popular states for <span style = 'color :#3b0056'> Asian students </span> in USA over 40% difference comparing to 1994 - 1995",
       caption = "Source: The Washington Post / Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.title = element_text(size = 9),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 7),
        legend.direction = "horizontal",
        legend.spacing.x = unit(0, units = "cm"),
        strip.text = element_text(family = "Lora", size = 10, face = "bold"),
        panel.spacing.y = unit(.5, "cm"),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#b0e0e6"),
        panel.border = element_rect(color = "transparent",
                                    fill = "transparent"),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Lora", size = 16, face = "bold", hjust = .5),
        plot.subtitle = element_markdown(family = "Fira Sans Condensed", size = 13, hjust = .5,
                                         margin = margin(b = 18)),
        plot.caption = element_text(family = "Fira Sans Condensed", size = 9,
                                    margin = margin(t = 10)),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = 7)),
        axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(r = 7)),
        plot.margin = margin(10, 10, 10, 10))
                     
ggsave("W39_SchoolDiversity.png", width = 31, height = 23, units = "cm")
             
```
